QNodeEditor.serialise package

Submodules

QNodeEditor.serialise.serialise module

Serialization class for objects that are serializable

class QNodeEditor.serialise.serialise.Serializable

Bases: object

Abstract base class for serializable objects

abstract get_state() → dict

Get the state of this object as a dictionary :return: dict: representation of object state

abstract set_state(state: dict, restore_id: bool = True) → bool

Set the state of this object based on a dictionary :param state: representation of object state :param restore_id: whether to restore the object id from state :return: bool: whether setting state succeeded

Module containing serialization logic
